title: "How to tame AI’s wild frontier"
excerpt: "Britain’s Conservative prime minister Rishi Sunak has seized on AI as an area where the UK can potentially project global influence, unveiling plans this week to create what he called the “world’s first AI safety institute” in Britain. This would investigate the capabilities and dangers of new types of AI, and share its work with the world."
